content:
Sure, here are some popular guided meditation apps and resources that you can use:

1. Headspace: A popular app that offers guided meditations for different goals such as stress relief, better sleep, and more. 2. Calm: Another popular app that provides guided meditations, soothing sleep stories, and relaxation music. 3. Insight Timer: A free meditation app that has guided meditations, talks by leading meditation teachers, and a timer for self-guided practice. 4. Smiling Mind: A free app that offers mindfulness and meditation exercises for adults and children. 5. UCLA Mindful Awareness Research Center: A website that provides free guided meditations for mindfulness, self-compassion, and other practices. 6. Tara Brach: A meditation teacher who offers guided meditations on her website, including a podcast series called "Mindfulness Meditation." I hope this helps!
